Ice Slushy Maker is a 2D simulator game where players make your drink using various ingredients. You can make slushies with mango, kiwi, blueberry, citrus or apricot. All you need to do is to decide which flavor you want to drink your frozen with. Then start preparing it in this cooking game!About This GameWhen summer comes, we all look for icy drinks for cool refreshments. A cold drink is good for each of us in the scorching heat. Well, in this simulator game, we will make our cold drinks according to our desires.We will use a freezer, ice trays, assorted fruits and a blender. Finally, we will choose one of the sweet straws. If you're ready, let's get to work without sweating anymore!Design Your Drinking CupStart with designing your plastic slush cup before preparing your drink. Choose a pattern for it among several options. From modern lines to ethnic designs, you can find many kinds of patterns.Then, you can add an emoji sticker on it if you want. You can also write your name on the cup. The choice is yours! We will also put a beautiful straw in the last stage.Choose Your FlavorIt's time to decide on which flavored slush you will drink.Your options are kiwi, apricot, blueberries, citrus, strawberry, blackberry, lemon, orange and banana.Choose your favorite one and start making your iced drink.There are different ice trays for you to create ice cubes in different shapes.You can create heart-shaped, x-shaped, triangular or pentagonal ice molds with them.Select one of them and fill it with water. Then, send it to the freezer.Once you have ice, you can start chopping your fruits.If all your ingredients are complete, put them in the blender.Mix them until they thicken, and your drink is ready!ControlsLeft Mouse Button: To pick up ingredientsDeveloperFreezeNova developed Ice Slushy Maker.Explore Other GamesSandspiel may also draw your attention.
